sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Migrates the list of fields found in script include hr_TransferCase.IGNORED_FIELDS to system property 'sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields'.</description> <name>Migrate transfer case ignore fields</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var fields = hr_TransferCase.IGNORED_FIELDS;
if (!fields) return;
gs.info('[Fix Script]: Migrating hr_TransferCase.IGNORED_FIELDS to sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields'); gs.setProperty("sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields", fields.toString()); }());]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-12 22:29:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>160fafe65d151010fa9bf546d0428353</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Migrate transfer case ignore fields</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_160fafe65d151010fa9bf546d0428353</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-12 22:32:28</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
